categories: Category:Battles of the Great Galactic War

nodes.text: Attack on the Third Imperial Assault Fleet

During the Great Galactic War between the reconstituted Sith Empire and the Galactic Republic, a traitor betrayed the Third Imperial Assault Fleet, leading to an ambush by the Republic Navy that wiped out most of the Imperial fleet. Over twenty thousand Imperial lives were lost, along with more than eighty percent of the ships in the fleet.
